title: Bypass GuardDuty Pentest Findings for the AWS CLI
summary: Prevent Kali Linux, ParrotOS, and Pentoo Linux from throwing GuardDuty alerts by modifying the User Agent string when using the AWS CLI.

title: Bypass Credential Exfiltration Detection
summary: When stealing IAM credentials from an EC2 instance you can avoid a GuardDuty detection by using VPC Endpoints.
